page.title: 05ROUGE BOUILLON SCHOOL
page.content: {Rouge Bouillon School}was a secondary school until 1982 but now the main building is a large primary school.The children who come to the school live in the whole of the centre and west part of St.Helier. The school has three units inside it. One is for{deaf children,}one for{slow {learners }and one for{children }who come from {other countries.}Over 80 of these children come from {Madeira.} Their parents have come to Jersey to work in hotels and on farms.The children from the units work in the ordinary classes but have special lessons for about half of each day. A separate block in the school houses a {nursery unit }for children from 3 to 5 years of age, the{Teachers Centre }and the {Remedial Education Advisory {Service. }
